text: Leonardo DiCaprio has posted the first glimpse of himself and Brad Pitt in what could be the hottest casting of all time for their upcoming film, Once Upon a Time in Hollywood. Thanks to Leo's Instagram we've got our first look at Quentin Tarantino's highly anticipated Hollywood tale set in 1960's California shortly after the chilling Charles Manson murders rocked Tinsel Town, especially the gruesome slaying of pregnant starlet, Sharon Tate. On Wednesday the Oscar - winner shared a pic of himself and 54 - year - old Brad smoldering straight at the camera while wearing some retro threads looking like absolute dreamboats.
